meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one million hertz.
meanings.sent1: My radio station broadcasts at one megahertz.
meanings.sent2: The computer processor operates at several megahertz.
meanings.sent3: I tried to count the megahertz of the buzzing bee, but it was too fast!
meanings.sent4: The city's energy was pulsing at a million megahertz, vibrant and alive.
meanings.sent5: The megahertz of the alarm clock was so high-pitched, it woke up the entire neighborhood.

meanings.definition: A measurement of the frequency of electromagnetic radiation.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the electromagnetic radiation in megahertz.
meanings.sent2: The satellite communication system operates in megahertz.
meanings.sent3: The aliens communicated with Earth using megahertz as their language.
meanings.sent4: The megahertz of the sun's rays bathed the planet in warmth and light.
meanings.sent5: The megahertz of the radio waves carried messages across the airwaves.
